net.sf.sprockets.widget

Class ParallaxViewScrollListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.DataSetObserver
      • net.sf.sprockets.widget.ListScrollListeners.ObservingScrollListener
        • net.sf.sprockets.widget.ParallaxViewScrollListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbsListView.OnScrollListener

    public class ParallaxViewScrollListener
extends ListScrollListeners.ObservingScrollListener
    Synchronises the scrolling of a View with a ListView, at a speed relative to the list scrolling speed.

    Sample Usage

    Sample Layout

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParallaxViewScrollListener

        public ParallaxViewScrollListener(View view,
                          float speed)
        Scroll the View at the speed relative to the list scrolling speed.
        Parameters:
        speed - e.g. 0.5f for half of the list scrolling speed
